overview: The report investigates allegations of conflict of interest and abuse of authority by a senior official in the United Nations Mission in Liberia (UNMIL) regarding business dealings in Liberia.

background.context: The investigation was conducted by the Investigations Division of the Office of Internal Oversight Services in response to allegations concerning a Senior Official at UNMIL.

investigation_details.subject: Allegations of conflict of interest and abuse of authority by Senior Official 1, UNMIL

allegations.description: Senior Official involvement in business dealings with a businessman in Liberia and abuse of authority for personal or third-party benefit.
allegations.findings: The investigation found no evidence supporting the allegations; the Senior Official was not involved in any inappropriate business dealings.

findings: The allegations of conflict of interest and abuse of authority by the Senior Official were not substantiated after investigation.
